family.name: coupons
family.description:
Coupons for an [order][order] can be managed through the coupon info resource. This is where [coupons][coupons] that are applied to an [order][order] are listed, as well as a form to apply new [coupons][coupons]. Each coupon is linked to the promotions it triggered. If no promotions were triggered then no promotion link will be present.
[coupons]: #coupons [order]: #orders
